titleStmt.title: The mysterie of redemption. Or The particular manner how man is redeemed from sinne, iustified before God, and made partaker of euerlasting life Describing the nature, causes, parts, properties and effects of iustification. With divers sweet and comfortable prayers interposed betweene euerie chapter.
Mysterie of redemption.
titleStmt.author: Powel, Gabriel, 1576-1611.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for VVilliam Cotton,

notesStmt.note: Title page in read and black.
Identified as STC 20147a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
